name: Saving Elli
description:
Saving Elli

An evil alien has abducted your friend Elli and your mission is to find her and save her from the claws of this super evil alien.
To find Elli you'll have to travel through 100 small levels and navigate through many different challenges.

NOTE: Saving Elli is still  under development. This version contains about 26 playable levels.

Feedback

I would love to hear your thoughts and suggestions,.. the good, the bad and the ugly.

You can reach me via:

  • Twitter messages
  • Discord: Saeed Prez#6744
  • E-mail: saeedprez@gmail.com
  • Or simply leave a comment down below..

The absolute best thing would be if you could record your screen while playing and share it with me 😍🙏👍
